-1.title: Trail Blazers
-1.plot: Turtleman hears the 'call of the wild' and heads deep into the woods with Neal James. They take on gnarly gar, a hive of honeybees, and a narrow cavern passage to find a Forgotten Valley deep in the way-backwoods Turtleman hasn't seen in years.

1.title: Dirty Jobs
1.plot: A farmer's cows are being attacked when cooling off in the stock pond, emerging with missing utters. All signs lead to a group of snapping turtles, and Ernie is happy to jump on the case. The catch: the pond is overflowing with cow manure and bacteria.

2.title: Groundhog Day
2.plot: A critter is trapped in a cave and Turtleman and Neal must risk their lives to rescue it. They must reach the exit before they all suffocate on excessive carbon dioxide. Then, Turtleman and Neal must locate unwanted critters nestled in a hair salon.

3.title: Possum Poltergeist
3.plot: When a local radio host challenges Turtleman to venture deep into the haunted woods of Kentucky and evict a school of venomous reptiles and rabid rodents, he is sent on a wild adventure to protect his Blue Grass name and legend.

4.title: The Turtles of Alcatraz Pond
4.plot: Turtleman comes face-to-face with a crafty critter he has never before tackled. Then, Turtleman and Team Turtle must find and safely return a prized peacock that has gone missing from a local Renaissance Fair.

5.title: Fort Rattlesnake
5.plot: Turtleman spots a vicious raccoon at an old trading post and must remove the creature without damaging the historic structure. It's man vs. beast and whoever makes the first mistake will decide the future of one of the last standing stores of its kind.

6.title: Turtle Boot Camp
6.plot: A farmer's hens are mysteriously disappearing from his chicken coop, and Turtleman's called in to catch the mysterious predator.

7.title: Hole-y Cow
7.plot: Turtleman races against the clock to save a calf that's fallen down a deep sinkhole and is in distress. Something is lurking in the Wilkins family pond - an animal so big, it broke the line Mrs. Wilkins set to trap it.

8.title: Snakes in a Playhouse
8.plot: Turtleman hears of a job in North Carolina - a man's duck pond is being terrorized by turtles. Just a routine job until he finds out this call has come from David Ragan, one of the biggest stars of Turtleman's favorite sport-NASCAR.

9.title: Poachers Paradise
9.plot: Turtleman and his crew stage a daring night rescue to save turtles threatened by a band of poachers. Things don't get much brighter when a nuisance call requires Turtleman to descend thirty feet into an underground spring to remove a mysterious animal.

10.title: Beasts of the Bayou
10.plot: Backwoods meets the bayou when Turtleman and Neal take a road trip down to Louisiana to investigate a mysterious predator locals call the "Beast of the Bayou." Armadillos burrows are destroying the foundation of a family's home.

11.title: Danger in the Distillery
11.plot: Turkeys are nesting inside a local corn-maze and frightening the kids who visit - now it's up to the Turtleman to find these birds and relocate them, before the maze shuts down for good.

12.title: Dilapidated Death Trap
12.plot: An historic Kentucky home is slated for renovation but when the owner discovers it crawling with critters, Turtleman must rescue the animals before a wrecking ball evicts them first.

17.title: Speedway Squatters
17.plot: Varmints have taken over Ponderosa Speedway and rustling them up is too much for Turtleman alone. Together, the Turtle Team catches wily raccoons, grizzly groundhogs and a mama possum! Then, Turtleman has to track down an escaped massive boa constrictor.

28.title: Fairground Fiasco
28.plot: A serial killer is on the loose at a local farm where rabbits have been getting brutally murdered on a nightly basis. At one of the last drive-in theaters in Kentucky, an unidentified critter is threatening to halt business.

1.title: Miner Threat
1.plot: Turtleman's got a date with a country critter that's got a taste for chewing the wooden support beams of a rural coalmine. Then, Turtleman must save the day after a tornado tears through the countryside, releasing lethal chemicals into a turtle pond.

2.title: Killer at Shaker Village
2.plot: Kentucky's Shaker Village is home to a bird sanctuary, but this church has got a new mystery member, and it's practicing blood sacrifice! Then, signs of a home invasion are becoming too much for one family to ignore, and Turtleman is their only hope.

3.title: Santa Claws
3.plot: A hedgehog at a local petting zoo turns up dead, with only a pair of tooth marks left as evidence. Then, local realtors are planning an open house for a historic Kentucky mansion when a critter with a taste for pastries undermines their selling attempts.

4.title: Beehive Massacre
4.plot: A bachelor auction has a treat for its bidders when Turtleman shows up as the prize of the party. Three ladies pool their money to win a date with the Turtleman, and he meets them for a date at one of his favorite haunts: a pond full of snapping turtles!

6.title: Hell Hog
6.plot: Turtleman's back in New Orleans and teaming up with John "Hogman" Schmidt. Wild hogs are posing a direct threat to a real estate developer's property. Then, shrimper Big Sexy's livelihood is at stake when a pack of muskrats prevent him from setting sail.

7.title: French Quarter Coyote
7.plot: Turtleman heads south to New Orleans to help innocent civilians in danger where a coyote is on the loose. He's then out to stop an invasive species destroying the Louisiana swampland in Baton Rouge.

8.title: Baby Mama Drama
8.plot: Turtleman must capture a critter he's never seen before! At a community pool, unwanted swimmers are keeping kids from cooling off on a hot summer day, and it's up to Turtleman to snatch these slithering swimmers!

9.title: Jaws of Hell
9.plot: The Turtle Team is going back to college to clean up a host of gnarly critters that have moved into a frat house. A snapping turtle attacks a local preacher's congregants during a baptism in a pond, and the ceremony can't resume without Turtleman's help.

10.title: Trailer Park Stinkbomb
10.plot: A beaver dam threatens erosion and flooding to a farm, while a pesky beaver drags the Turtle team through the mud. Local trailer park residents flee after a putrid odor persists for several days. The source is the vermin Turtleman hates most -- a skunk!

11.title: Night of the Digging Dead
11.plot: A local cemetery is being disrespected by a canine whose cunning is matched only by its beauty. An emu farmer has lost one of his prized birds and despite no experience with these exotic animals, Turtleman agrees to find it.

12.title: Sawmill Slasher
12.plot: Turtle Team Jake's wood-supplier is forced to shut down after a mysterious critter chews through the sawmill's wiring. Turtleman makes a last-ditch effort to clear the studio of snakes before a Kentucky bluegrass legend arrives for his instrument.

13.title: Tee'd Off Turtles
13.plot: Turtleman and Neal found the Forgotten Valley, but their adventure is just beginning! After a close call in a cave, the guys head through swarms of bugs and make a deal with an old friend for supplies - only to find a raging river blocking the way home.

14.title: Pig Wallow Predator
14.plot: Turtleman shows some Kentucky pride when he's called to rescue a stable of horses from a potentially venomous snake. At a local swine farmer's watering hole, a drift of hogs and a pair of snapping turtles are careening on a mutual path toward destruction.

15.title: Lone Stars and Stripes: More Live Action!
15.plot:

16.title: River Monster Mystery: More Live Action!
16.plot:

18.title: Lured Into Danger: More Live Action!
18.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

19.title: Fur for the Course: More Live Action!
19.plot: A miniature golf course has critter droppings all over the grounds, so Turtleman must locate the nuisance creatures and remove them from the putting green. Then, a pet wallaby has gone missing and Turtleman must find it and bring it home to safety.

20.title: (Don't) Leave It to Beaver: More Live Action!
20.plot: Team Turtle gathers at a goat farm where a vicious animal is picking off Mary's "fainting" goats one by one. Then, Turtleman is called to an off-roading park to save a critter from a mud hole that the park's visitors drive through.

1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot:

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: All Skunked Up
3.plot: A cattle farm has been losing calves, and it's up to Turtleman to stop the ferocious critter butcher. Then, the live action continues when Turtleman must catch a skunk that is threatening to put a local sculptor out of business by spraying his art.

4.title: Hook, Line and Snapper
4.plot: A feed store has been opening its doors to a crime scene, and Turtleman must find and stop the feisty freeloader before things get even messier! Then it's all-new live action when Turtlemom decides to help her son relocate snappers from her pond!

5.title: Episode #3.5
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Deer Destruction
6.plot: Turtleman is called to safely remove a furry intruder after a consignment store window is smashed. Then, a local homeowner is throwing a party, but has a critter living in his hot tub. Turtleman must catch the critter before guests start to arrive!

7.title: Freddy Critter's Revenge
7.plot: Local homeowners find a furry tenant denned up in their house, and Turtleman must save it before demolition is approved! The live action continues when Turtleman gears up to save a raccoon trapped in a farmer's silo before the deadly gasses harm it.

8.title: 12 Angry Pigeons
8.plot: Turtleman must remove the flock from a jobsite where workers are cleaning up bird feces. Then, a caretaker finds a critter living under her log cabin, and Turtleman must relocate it before the foundation collapses!

9.title: Savage Stowaways
9.plot: Turtleman must help remove mess-making critters on a houseboat that's being closed for the winter. Then, snappers are threatening to halt production at a distillery, and Turtleman must safely remove and relocate them.

10.title: Major League Menace
10.plot: A critter has denned up in a major league baseball stadium and Turtleman must remove it before opening day! Then, a furry freeloader is overstaying its welcome at a local Bed and Breakfast and Turtleman must remove it before guests check out instead.

11.title: Episode #3.11
11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Best Little Boar House in Texas
12.plot: Turtleman must relocate a rattlesnake so storeowners can resume their business. Then, a feisty freeloader is going through the garbage of a barbeque joint and Turtleman must catch it before the situation gets even messier!

13.title: Bat Hair Day
13.plot: A critter is trapped in a cave and Turtleman and Neal must risk their lives to rescue it. They must reach the exit before they all suffocate on excessive carbon dioxide. Then, Turtleman and Neal must locate unwanted critters nestled in a hair salon.

14.title: Wild Receiver
14.plot: Two students steal their football rival's mascot, and Team Turtle must tame the reckless beast before it escapes the backyard it's trapped in. Then, an alligator is threatening to nestle up in a residential area and Team Turtle must relocate it.

15.title: Ernie le'Pew
15.plot: A farmer is losing his goats to a ferocious feline and Turtleman must capture it before it gets its paws on another one! Then, show dogs are being attacked by a smelly skunk and Turtleman must relocate the critter before all of the dogs get sprayed.

16.title: Lone Stars and Stripes
16.plot: A film set is being damaged by a hole-digging critter and Turtleman must remove this digger before production starts up! Then, a zebra has gone missing and Turtleman must locate it and safely bring it back to its farm. It's the wildest live action so far!

17.title: River Monster Mystery
17.plot: A hole-digging critter is disrupting the grounds of a farm and Turtleman must capture it so the rancher can train his bull. Then, snappers are keeping people from tubing down the Guadalupe River and Turtleman must relocate them so the fun can resume.

18.title: The Bull and the Beautiful
18.plot: While hunting in the abandoned old hospital Turtleman finally captures the culprit Dr Jackle a live raccoon.

19.title: Episode #3.19
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: Don't Leave it to Beaver
20.plot: A gnawing critter is taking down valuable Christmas trees and Turtleman must catch it to ensure there will be trees left for the holidays! Then, a climbing critter has nestled up in a warehouse and Turtleman must relocate it so the work can resume.

21.title: Get Otter My Pond
21.plot: Turtleman comes face-to-face with a crafty critter he has never before tackled. Then, Turtleman and Team Turtle must find and safely return a prized peacock that has gone missing from a local Renaissance Fair.

2.title: Snap 'n' Splash
2.plot: Turtleman, Neal, and Jake set a trap to catch the vicious animal that has been terrorizing the horses at Pauls Mill horse farm. Then, Turtleman and Neal rush to help their buddy, Jake, whose racecars are getting damaged by a troublesome critter.

3.title: Bear Necessities
3.plot: Team Turtle gathers at a goat farm where a vicious animal is picking off Mary's "fainting" goats one by one. Then, Turtleman is called to an off-roading park to save a critter from a mud hole that the park's visitors drive through.

4.title: Headless Horror
4.plot: Neither the chickens nor the eggs are safe from a predator that's been helping itself to the residents of Lindsey's chicken coop. Then, Turtleman must catch a tree-chomping critter that's wreaking havoc on a vacation community by the Red River Gorge.

5.title: Kneel Before Sod
5.plot: When the owner of a storage facility hears a critter in one of his storage units, he knows it's time to call Turtleman. Then, Turtleman must track down the animal that's eating through the high value product in Allen's cigar warehouse.

6.title: Troll in the Coal
6.plot: Dodging high-speed paintballs is all part of the job when Team Turtle takes a critter call from the owner of a paintball park. Then, Turtleman's excitement explodes when he's called to a fireworks store with a major critter problem.

7.title: Ghost Town Gold Rush
7.plot: Turtleman responds to a critter call at a manor that was once visited by President Abraham Lincoln. Then, newlyweds Randy and Candace ask Turtleman for help when a menacing rattling can be heard in their RV.

8.title: Snake Town Shakedown
8.plot: Turtleman is called in for his smelliest live action yet when the worms at a worm farm have become a snack for a troublesome critter. Then, Neal brings Turtleman to his grandpa's house to clear out the snakes that are occupying the basement.

9.title: Choas in Critter Cavern
9.plot: A critter has been creeping inside the walls of Jerry's unique home, so Turtleman and Neal are called in to investigate. Then, Turtleman takes on a 12-foot Burmese python that's been secretly slithering around Christa's house for several years.

10.title: Swine Dining
10.plot: When one of John's pigs goes missing, Team Turtle arrives on the scene to find the carnivorous predator that poached the swine. Then, the owner of a bowling alley calls Turtleman when an animal that he thought was dead turns out to be very much alive!

11.title: Turtleman Takes Manhattan
11.plot: Turtleman and Neal tell the tale of their trip to find Turtlemom the perfect holiday gift... in New York City! From Central Park to world-famous Times Square, the boys see new sights, make new friends, and tour the Big Apple as only Team Turtle can.12/22/

imdb.title: Call of the Wildman
plot: A guy they call "turtleman" has a job in central Kentucky where he catches wild animals of all variety with his bestfriend Neil and his dog loly
